alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 08 at 3:23PM CDT until August 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TUESDAY TO 1 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected with tides 1 to 1.5 feet above ground level. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower Terrebonne, Lower Lafourche, Coastal Jefferson Parish, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Hancock, Harrison and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Tuesday to 1 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coastal Flood conditions will not occur throughout the entire time of the advisory but will occur at different points along the coast at different times and will occur multiple time over the next 3 days during high tide.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; Southeast St. Tammany
